body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Thumb Gardening Service. My name is Bryan Washington. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Bryan, I'm Anna Russell. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Anna. Can you please provide me with your order number and email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is one two three four five and my email is anna.russell@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Anna. How can I assist you with your return today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the return process. How long does it usually take to receive a refund?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Typically, refunds are processed within five to seven business days once we receive the returned items.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's good to know. One more question - do you provide return labels for shipping back the items?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, we can provide you with a prepaid return label for your convenience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time and patience, Anna. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
